text:
[Verse]
Morning light is creeping in
Open up my eyes again
Feel the warmth upon my skin
Let the brand new day begin

[Verse 2]
Birds are singing in the trees
Softly swaying in the breeze
Golden rays that dance and tease
Everything feels so at ease

[Chorus]
Sunshine on my face today
Chasing all the clouds away
Every moment feels okay
Sunshine on my face today

[Verse 3]
Step outside and take a breath
Leave behind the worries left
Every step
I got some pep
In the sunlight
I feel blessed

[Bridge]
Let the colors fill the sky
In the warmth
We rise so high
No more shadows
No more lies
In the sunshine
We comply

[Chorus]
Sunshine on my face today
Chasing all the clouds away
Every moment feels okay
Sunshine on my face today
title: Sunshine on My Face
